item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon APAC 2021
item.description:
Bella Gelateria

I gave a keynote speech at PyCon APAC 2021, which was hosted by PyCon Thailand. This was an online event, so I didn’t actually go to Thailand for this. However, I found an ice cream flavour that represent Thailand: Thai Coconut Milk Gelato from Bella Gelateria!

Bella Gelateria has one of the best ice cream in Vancouver, they’ve won many awards!

Belated #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconapac @pyconthailand
🇹🇭🐍 🍦😝🤳
Trekked all the way to Vancouver to find Thai Coconut Milk gelato from @bellagelateria pic.twitter.com/G3CjqJAHFS

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Global Maintainer Summit 2021
item.description:
Snowy Village

I gave a talk about The Bots of CPython at GitHub Global Maintainer Summit. It was an online event, so I looked for local ice cream shops where I live.

Snowy Village is my kids favorite place here. They really love the bingsu, which is milk-based Korean shaved ice dessert.

Bingsu counts as ice cream! #IceCreamSelfie 🍦😝🤳 @ Snowy Village pic.twitter.com/ZKqlTZkZUK

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2021
item.description:
Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream

If you ever come to Port Moody, you must make a stop at Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream. All of their ice creams are made from scratch locally, and they have vegan options too.

🍦😝🤳 The time has come for #IceCreamSelfie #PyCon #PyConUS #PyConUS2021
Whiskey Hazelnut and Chocolate Brownie Ice Cream @ Vashti Rose Ice Cream pic.twitter.com/eUmMbIKECH

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Belarus 2021
item.description:
Matteo’s Gelato

I went to Matteo’s Gelato in Port Coquitlam for this one, after first taking a stroll along Coquitlam River @ Lions Park.

Crème brûlée and chocolate hazelnut gelato from Matteo's Gelato in Port Coquitlam. My reward for giving @pyconby closing keynote.
🍦😝🤳 #IceCreamSelfie pic.twitter.com/i3zume2skU

— Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) March 14, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCascades 2021
item.description:
At PyCascades 2021, I was on a panel with Guido van Rossum, Carol Willing, Brett Cannon, and Nina Zakharenko, so after that was done, I asked them to do an ice cream selfie with me. I’m glad they all obliged! 😊

I had the Nestle DRUMSTICK Sundae Cone.

A very special virtual #IceCreamSelfie with @WillingCarol @brettsky @nnja @gvanrossum #pycascades
🍦😝🤳 pic.twitter.com/MXUn0E3jRq
